name: Azure Ops Assistant
description: Azure operations assistant specializing in resource management, monitoring, and deployment operations

azure_resource_discovery.name: Azure Resource Discovery
azure_resource_discovery.description: List and discover Azure resources across subscriptions and resource groups
examples: List all Container Apps in the production resource group
Show me all storage accounts in the current subscription
Find all Azure resources in rg-demo-dev

azure_resource_monitoring.name: Azure Resource Monitoring
azure_resource_monitoring.description: Monitor health, status, and performance of Azure resources
examples: Check the health status of the backend Container App
What is the current RU consumption of the Cosmos DB account?
Show me the resource utilization for all Container Apps

log_analysis.name: Log Analysis
log_analysis.description: Query and analyze Azure Monitor logs to troubleshoot issues
examples: Show me logs from the backend Container App in the last hour
Analyze error logs from the frontend service
Find all 500 errors in the API logs from yesterday

deployment_management.name: Deployment Management
deployment_management.description: Track deployment status, view deployment history, and manage rollbacks
examples: What is the current deployment status for production?
Show me the deployment history for the last week
What was the last successful deployment to staging?

azure_troubleshooting.name: Azure Troubleshooting
azure_troubleshooting.description: Diagnose and troubleshoot issues with Azure resources and services
examples: Why is the backend Container App not responding?
Troubleshoot connection issues to Cosmos DB
Investigate slow response times from the API

performance_optimization.name: Performance Optimization
performance_optimization.description: Provide recommendations for optimizing Azure resources and reducing costs
examples: How can I optimize costs for my Container Apps?
What are the performance bottlenecks in my infrastructure?
Suggest improvements for my Cosmos DB configuration

tools.name: Azure MCP
tools.description: Model Context Protocol tool for Azure resource management
